AREAS OF INTEREST:
Computer Vision, Human-Computer Interaction, Artificial Intelligence, Image processing.
M.Tech: Software Requirement & Engineering, Software Architecture, Agile Software Development, Software Reliability, Genetic Algorithm, Advanced Software Engineering, Software Testing.
B.Tech: Data Structures, Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Database Management Systems, Artificial Intelligence, Operating Systems, Computer Organization, Computer Architecture.
M.TECH THESIS (2018):
Title: A Stride towards the competence of Sixth Sense Technology.
Supervisor: Dr. Alka Agrawal, BBAU, Lucknow
Description: This work is primarily concerned with different security techniques and methods in Sixth Sense Technology. We propose some software and hardware implementation with the help of which we can solve the issues in Sixth Sense Device. The study discusses about different proposed security techniques. These techniques have been implemented with the help of Visual Studio 2012 and MATLAB. As the issue in Sixth sense Technology is majorly related to the images and data security, the study tries to resolve the Security issues by using Human and Object Tracking techniques, converting images into byte array and providing device security by using Biometric System.
B.TECH Project (2014):
Title: Campus Job Selection System
Supervisor: Anand.K.Dwivedi, MIPS, Kanpur
I did my final year B.Tech project on the Campus Job Selection System. The main concept behind the development of this project is the students who are not able to appear in the college placement process due to their low percentage can be appear directly on the basis of the exam conducted with the help of this portal. It is based on desktop application, designed with the help of Visual studio .net and database was used in MYSQL. The project was divided into three modules student, company and admin module each module was designed in such manner that they are interrelated to each other.
